accountsort.warning.message: Regular mail accounts, Unix Movemail accounts as well as RSS accounts must come first. Local Folders are next, and at the bottom of the list are the News accounts. You can override this by choosing either Local Folders or one of the Newsgroup accounts as default, hence putting it on top of the list.
